description.@en: It is one thing to say you know God, but it is another to say you understand the multitude of spirits in this world and their true aims.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Theology. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Theology, ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
